high_descs: Turn around, go forward, then turn right to face the toilet.
Pick up the bar of soap on the back of the toilet.
Look downward, to the trash bin.
Put the bar of soap in the trash bin.
anns.task_desc: Put a bar of soap in the trash.

high_descs: Turn around and walk slightly forward to the toilet.
Pick up the bar of soap on the top of the toilet between the two spray bottles.
Bend down toward the garbage can to the right of the toilet.
Put the bar of soap in the garbage can.
anns.task_desc: Put a bar of soap in a garbage can.

high_descs: Turn left to face the toilet.
Pick up the bar of soap on the toilet tank.
Look down at the trash can.
Throw away the soap in the trash can.
anns.task_desc: Throw away the soap on the toilet tank.
